Name: Sin; Vengeance
About the game: '...this is the reality of war. The darkness of men. It is but a means to an end. The sooner you accept that, the easier things will be for you.' After the tragic destruction of your home, you form an army in search of vengeance. How far are you willing to go to satisfy your grievance? Will there be forgiveness and penance? Or will you be wrath incarnate, and destroy your enemies with pure malice and ruthlessness? In this SRPG, lead your army, and make your own choice that changes the outcome of the game.
